channel.title: Raspberrypi on Kiran Chavala Tech Notes

item.title: Raspberry pi
item.description: After hearing frequent mentions of Raspberry pi use cases, I had decided to buy Raspberry pi 4 model. The site https://www.thingbits.in was giving best discounts on pi and it’s accessories. The best use case of pi was the implementation of PI-HOLE which blocks all the ads on websites. Here are links i used for the complete installation of pi and implementation of PI-HOLE https://docs.pi-hole.net/ https://medium.com/swlh/how-to-set-up-pi-hole-2293246dc8ed https://filterlists.com/lists/pl-host-file
